item.title: Rattaching a running process to a screen
item.description: Reptyr is a small project written in C that enable you to “re-pty” your process. It means you can, for example, attach a running process inside a screen. For example, you launched irssi outside your screen, and you do not want to relaunch it. Install reptyr, then, in a screen, run the following commands: $ pidof irssi 27518 $ reptyr 27518 That’s it. The process will be rattached to Init but you will be able to use it directly from your screen, without notifying the difference.
